Refereed journal articles（査読付き論文）

  2. Hayashi I., Fujita H., Toju H. (2024) Deterministic and stochastic processes generating alternative states of microbiomes. ISME Communications. 10.1093/ismeco/ycae007.

  5. Yajima D., Fujita H., Hayashi I., Shima G., Suzuki K., Toju H. (2023) Core species and interactions prominent in fish-associated microbiome dynamics. Microbiome. 10.1186/s40168-023-01498-x.
